text.fileTooLarge: PDF file is too large. It can be at max {{size}}MB large.

text.emptyHomeworksInfo: All homeworks are shown in the homeworks section.
text.emptyNewsInfo: No recent news. Check the news section to stay informed.
text.empytTimetableInfo: Normally we display here your current timetable. You can find your learning content in the course section.

text.CourseFilesDesc: Here you will find all files used in the respective courses in class. All participants of the course, the teacher and the students, have access to these files.
text.PersonalFilesDesc: Here you can find all your personal files. Only you have access to these files, but you can also share them with other users.
text.SharedFilesDesc: Here you can find all the files you have shared with you. These are files that have been provided by other users.
text.TeamFilesDesc: Here you will find all files used in the respective courses in class. All participants of the team have access to these files.

topMenu.qrHintText: Navigate other users to this site

registration.registationFailedAuthParagraph: Unfortunately the link is no longer valid. Request a new link from your teacher or school administrator.
registration.registationFailedContinue: The school cloud was embedded in a website. To continue
registration.registationFailedContinueLink: open this page in a separate window

text.superheroForbidden: You are trying log in with a superhero account. Please use another account
